languages.text: "Шерин, я получила важное послание. Пощада и круг Миссии желают меня видеть. Большая честь!" {n}Контрабандистка улыбается, но под обычной веселой маской Джай затаилась тревога.{/n} "Не буду лгать, что это полностью безопасно, но... Может, ты бы хотел{mf||а} отправиться туда со мной?"

"Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, я получила важное послание. Пощада и круг Миссии желают меня видеть. Большая честь!" {n}Контрабандистка улыбается, но под обычной веселой маской Джай затаилась тревога.{/n} "Не буду лгать, что это полностью безопасно, но... Может, ты бы хотел{mf||а} отправиться туда со мной?"

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “亲爱的，我收到了一条重要的信息，悯慈和组织高层打算见我一面。真是让我受宠若惊！”{n}尽管婕伊的语气保持着一贯的开朗，但你感觉到了她的警觉之意。{/n}“我不打算骗你说这场旅程没有任何危险，不过……或许你不介意和我一起去，嗯？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，我收到了一条重要的信息，悯慈和组织高层打算见我一面。”{n}尽管婕伊的语气保持着一贯的开朗，但你感觉到了她的警觉之意。{/n}“我不打算骗你说这场旅程没有任何危险，不过……你不介意和我一起去吧？”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「シャリーン、重要なメッセージを受け取ったよ。マーシーと聖務団がアタシに会いたがってる。いやぁ、光栄だね！」{n}ジェイは笑顔を見せる。しかし、いつもの明るい表情の奥から漏れ出る不安な気持ちが伝わった。{/n}「嘘はつかない、完全に安全だとも言えない、でも…一緒に来てくれない？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、重要なメッセージを受け取ったよ。マーシーと聖務団がアタシに会いたがってる。いやぁ、光栄だね！」{n}ジェイは笑顔を見せる。しかし、いつもの明るい表情の奥から漏れ出る不安な気持ちが伝わった。{/n}「嘘はつかない、完全に安全だとも言えない、でも…一緒に来てくれない？」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Shereen, he recibido un mensaje importante. Mercy y el círculo de la misión quieren verme. ¡Es todo un honor!». {n}Jae sonríe, pero logras ver la alarma que busca ocultar con su jovialidad.{/n} «No voy a mentirle afirmando que es completamente seguro, pero... ¿tal vez le apetecería acompañarme?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, he recibido un mensaje importante. Mercy y el círculo de la misión quieren verme». {n}Logras ver la alarma que la habitual falsa jovialidad de Jae busca ocultar.{/n} «No voy a mentirle afirmando que es completamente seguro, pero... ¿le importaría acompañarme?».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Shereen, j'ai reçu un message de la plus haute importance : Mercy et le cercle de la Mission veulent me voir. C'est un grand honneur ! » {n}Jae a beau sourire, vous percevez l'inquiétude qui se dissimule sous sa jovialité habituelle.{/n} « Je ne vous cache pas que ça pourrait être dangereux, mais... peut-être accepteriez-vous de m'accompagner ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, j'ai reçu un message de la plus haute importance : Mercy et le cercle de la Mission veulent me voir. » {n}Vous percevez l'inquiétude qui se dissimule sous l'apparence joyeuse habituelle de Jae.{/n} « Je ne vous cache pas que ça pourrait être dangereux, mais... vous voudriez bien m'accompagner ? »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Shereen, ich habe eine wichtige Nachricht erhalten. Mercy und der Missionskreis wollen mich sehen. Das ist eine ziemliche Ehre!" {n}Jae lächelt, aber du spürst, wie verunsichert sie ist, obwohl sie ihre übliche heitere Fassade trägt.{/n} "Ich würde lügen, wenn ich sagte, dass es völlig sicher ist, aber ... würdet Ihr mich begleiten?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, ich habe eine wichtige Nachricht erhalten. Mercy und der Missionskreis wollen mich sehen. Das ist eine ziemliche Ehre!" {n}Jae lächelt, aber du spürst, wie verunsichert sie ist, obwohl sie ihre übliche heitere Fassade trägt.{/n} "Ich würde lügen, wenn ich sagte, dass es völlig sicher ist, aber ... würdet Ihr mich begleiten?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şirinim, önemli bir mesaj aldım. Merhamet ve Misyon grubu, beni görmek istiyormuş. Benim için çok büyük onur!" {n}Jae gülse de her zamanki neşeli tavrının altında kol gezen paniği hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Tamamen güvenli deyip yalan söylemeyeceğim... Benimle gelmek senin için sorun olur mu?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, I've received an important message. Mercy and the Mission circle want to see me. Quite the honour!" {n}Jae smiles, but you can sense the alarm lurking beneath her usual cheery facade.{/n} "I won't lie and say it's completely safe, but... perhaps you wouldn't mind coming with me?"

traits.locale_text: "Şirinim, önemli bir mesaj aldım. Merhamet ve Misyon grubu beni görmek istiyormuş. Benim için çok büyük onur!" {n}Jae gülüyor ama her zamanki neşeli tavırlarının altında kol gezen paniği hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Tamamen güvenli deyip yalan söylemeyeceğim ama... Belki de benimle gelmek senin için sorun olmaz?"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
